      • getEventHandlers

        private java.util.List<EventHandlerVO> getEventHandlers(int typeId,
                                                        int ref1,
                                                        int ref2)
        Note: eventHandlers.eventTypeRef2 matches on both the given ref2 and 0. This is to allow a single set of event handlers to be defined for user login events, rather than have to individually define them for each user.
